monthly.title: January 2026 — Foundation & Execution
monthly.theme: One system, one action per day

daily.title: Set up planner skeleton
daily.action: Open repo, verify calendar + plan.json wiring

tasks.title: Start 4HB Experiment: Dry Jan + 30g protein breakfast
tasks.description: Log data daily in tracker. Success: ≥26 dry days.

tasks.title: Japan Ski Prep: Test knee brace, pack meds
tasks.description: Pack list complete, pain management plan set.

tasks.title: Japan Trip: Ski & observe body response
tasks.description: Goal: Ski 3 days with pain <5/10. Track sleep.

tasks.title: Research cloud AI orchestration tools (AWS Step Functions vs. Prefect)
tasks.description: Document pros/cons. Choose one for POC.

tasks.title: Post-Japan Analysis: Adjust protocol based on data
tasks.description: Update MED routine. Decide on alcohol rule (e.g., weekends only).

tasks.title: Research Stem Cell Treatments for joint repair
tasks.description: Compile 3-5 clinics (Vietnam & global). Compare to sclerotherapy.

tasks.title: Book 7-day Health Retreat (Yoga/Wellness)
tasks.description: Target dates: April or May. Deposit paid.

tasks.title: Build AI Orchestration POC: 'Hello World' pipeline in chosen tool
tasks.description: Pipeline runs in cloud, triggers on simple event.
